bibl.title: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, May 9, 1898

div1.p: Lazear writes that he has not found time to visit Sweitzer. He thanks her for a birthday present, and invites her for a visit.

div1.head: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, May 9, 1898
div1.p:
I have been
hoping every day to
get out to see you
but have not suc-
ceeded in finding time

I want to thank
you very much for
the birthday present.
Cant you come in
and go to the theatre
with us? This is the
last week of the
season at the Lyceum

If it is nice to-
morrow (Tuesday) come
and take dinner and
stay all night and
go the theatre. I can
get time tomorrow
all night.

I hope you can
do this.

Mabel joins me in
love and hopes you
can come
